seriesStories.title: Muralitharan resumes bowling in the nets
seriesStories.subTitle: Murali's recovery from his shoulder surgery
seriesStories.summary: Muttiah Muralitharan's troublesome shoulder has recovered sufficiently for him to resume bowling and start the final stages of his rehabilitation from an injury that has sidelined him for eight months now
